document_data.caption: A map showing the Deepglen Stream in Myrloch Vale.
document_data.name: Deepglen Stream
document_data.mainbody: The '''Deepglen Stream''' was a small river found on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The Deepglen Stream originated within the eastern section of the [[Black Moutains]] in northern [[Gwynneth]]. The river flowed southeast through the [[Deepglen]] and into the [[Shee Pool]]. It exited the small lake by flowing south until connecting with the [[Myrloch]].
